Recommended card to use for mcc7011?
Bank (debit) and credit card centre are separate entities. You should be new to cc. Why not call up hotline to confirm.
On 1st Jan 2024  u have the opportunity to do 3k topup (assuming you already hit BHS). Once MA is maxed  cpf from salary will flow into SA instead of MA  supercharging your SA component.
If I top up start of the year  will be eligible for tax relief next year as well right?

It depends on your current financial situation.  Do you have any high interest debt to clear? How long is your investment timeline where you don't need to touch this 500k ? What is your risk appetite?
Tax relief will be for your income earned in 2024.. it will be assessed in 2025.
You can also top up MA whenever there is any insurance deduction  up to 8K a year for tax relief.
